attributes.action: order the unions responsible for the recent strike affecting waste collection and temporary school closures (etc) to refund a part cost of the council tax for non-service and additional child care costs imposed as a result of their strike action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Virtually all of us are facing tougher times.  Why should we, the complete innocents, have to tolerate a reduction in services, for which we have paid, or pay even more because of the actions of others?
